title: Implement multi-factor authentication (MFA)
description: As a customer, I want to enable multi-factor authentication, so that I can secure my account with an additional layer of protection.
attributes_and_rules: Must include support for OTP via SMS, email, and authenticator apps.
acceptance_criteria: MFA can be enabled/disabled by the user. The system prompts for MFA code during login if it's enabled.
test_cases: Given MFA is enabled, When a user logs in, Then the system should prompt for an MFA code.

title: Enforce strong password policies
description: As a customer, I want to create strong passwords, so that my account is protected against unauthorized access.
attributes_and_rules: Password must be at least 12 characters long, include uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters.
acceptance_criteria: Password policy is enforced during password creation and change.
test_cases: Given a user is setting a password, When it does not meet the criteria, Then the system should prompt to create a stronger password.

title: Establish role-based access control (RBAC)
description: As a system administrator, I want to manage user privileges based on roles, so that I can restrict access to sensitive areas of the portal.
attributes_and_rules: Users can be assigned roles that define their access levels. Roles must be configurable.
acceptance_criteria: Users have permissions according to their assigned role.
test_cases: Given a user has a specific role, When they attempt to access a restricted area, Then the system should allow or deny access based on their role.

title: Display personalized dashboard
description: As a customer, I want to see a personalized dashboard, so that I can view relevant products and services based on my profile.
attributes_and_rules: The dashboard content must update dynamically based on customer data.
acceptance_criteria: Dashboard shows personalized content based on the customer's profile.
test_cases: Given a user views their dashboard, When profile changes occur, Then the dashboard updates to reflect relevant content.

title: Develop responsive UI for multiple devices
description: As a user, I want the portal to be accessible from any device, so that I can have a consistent experience on desktops, tablets, and mobile phones.
attributes_and_rules: The UI must adapt to different screen sizes and resolutions.
acceptance_criteria: UI functionality is consistent across all supported devices.
test_cases: Given different device types, When accessing the portal, Then the interface should render appropriately.

epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
title: Implement efficient account opening workflows
description: As a new customer, I want a streamlined account opening process, so that I can easily create a new account with minimal input.
attributes_and_rules: The workflow must include user guidance, validation, document upload, and the ability to save progress.
acceptance_criteria: Users can complete account opening with minimal friction.
test_cases: Given a new customer, When they follow the account opening process, Then they should complete it successfully with user guidance.

title: Enable real-time notifications and status tracking
description: As a customer, I want to receive real-time updates and notifications, so that I can track the status of my requests.
attributes_and_rules: Notifications must be configurable and sent for key status changes.
acceptance_criteria: Users receive real-time notifications and can track request statuses within the portal.
test_cases: Given user-configured notifications, When a key status change occurs, Then the user should receive an update.

title: Maintain interaction history and audit logs
description: As a system auditor, I want detailed logs of all interactions, so that I can ensure compliance and review activity history.
attributes_and_rules: Logs must be secure, immutable, and accessible for review.
acceptance_criteria: Detailed interaction history is maintained and accessible for audits.
test_cases: Given a user action, When it occurs on the portal, Then the action should be logged in the audit record.

title: Integrate with core banking systems
description: As a developer, I want seamless synchronization with core banking systems, so that customer data and status updates are always accurate.
attributes_and_rules: Integration must ensure data consistency and real-time updates.
acceptance_criteria: Data consistency is maintained between the portal and core systems.
test_cases: Given a data update, When it occurs in the core systems, Then the portal should reflect the updated data in real-time.

epic_title: Portal Database Management and Performance Optimization
title: Optimize portal database performance
description: As a database administrator, I want an optimized database for the portal, so that data retrieval is fast and reliable.
attributes_and_rules: Database must support secure, high-performance operations with data encryption.
acceptance_criteria: Database queries perform efficiently and data is encrypted.
test_cases: Given database requests, When performed on the portal, Then they should complete quickly and securely.
